pr_title: Just remove the test annotation from ignored tests....don't want these to even be reported on Pipeline for now

timeline.message: Remove ignored tests by removing the test annotation

timeline.bodyText:
When There is no test now, using this class can we just keep this annotation(@RunWith(Parameterized.class)) as it is ?
Though I understand if no test is using it, what's the point of having this annotation and also if this annotation requires any processing where some cost is spent in terms of resources/time. Just a thought
timeline.author: ayushmeghwani

replies.bodyText: If the annotation is kept then Android Studio think there is a test in this class that is meant to be run.....so to avoid Android Studio being confused, I just removed the annotation.
replies.author: shahzaibj
